com.turnout.ws.controller

Class OfferController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turnout.ws.controller.OfferController

  • @RestController
@Path(value="/")
public class OfferController
extends java.lang.Object
    OfferController class is front face for accessing and manipulating offers(promos and upsells) related resources.Class and all of its method is mapped with URI path template to which the resource responds. This class is registered with jersey resource configuration, So user can access it and its method by specified URI path template.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OfferController(OffersService ofrService, StudioService studioService)
      An injectable constructor with dependencies of ofrService,studioService as argument.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.json.simple.JSONObject getOffers(java.lang.String beaconId, java.lang.String type)
      This method used to get active offers from database based on the beacon id and offer type.
      org.json.simple.JSONObject offerDetails(int ofrId)
      This method will get offer details from database based on offer id.
      org.json.simple.JSONArray offerSearch(java.lang.String ofrname)
      This method used to get all the offers from database and helps to search the offers based on offer name.
      org.json.simple.JSONObject saveOffers(org.json.simple.JSONObject ofrReq)
      This method is used to save welcome/ exit notification offers into database.

public OfferController(OffersService ofrService,
                         StudioService studioService)
        An injectable constructor with dependencies of ofrService,studioService as argument.

    • Method Detail

      • getOffers

        @RolesAllowed(value="USER")
@GET
@Path(value="/offers/{beaconId}/{type}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject getOffers(@PathParam(value="beaconId")
                                                                  java.lang.String beaconId,
                                                                  @PathParam(value="type")
                                                                  java.lang.String type)
        This method used to get active offers from database based on the beacon id and offer type.
        Parameters:
        beaconId - An id of beacon mapped with specific studio.
        type - It is used to specify the notification type like welcome or exit.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject which contains whole details of welcome / exit notification.

      • saveOffers

        @RolesAllowed(value="ADMIN")
@POST
@Path(value="/saveOffers")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject saveOffers(org.json.simple.JSONObject ofrReq)
                                      throws java.text.ParseException
        This method is used to save welcome/ exit notification offers into database. It will return a offer id of just inserted or updated.
        Parameters:
        ofrReq - A JSONObject contain information of offers.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject that has a value of offer id.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - Exception throw when parsing value empty.

      • offerSearch

        @RolesAllowed(value="ADMIN")
@GET
@Path(value="/offersSearch/ofrname/{ofrname}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONArray offerSearch(@PathParam(value="ofrname")
                                                                   java.lang.String ofrname)
        This method used to get all the offers from database and helps to search the offers based on offer name.
        Parameters:
        ofrname - A string holds a text that has to be searched.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONArray contains all the results after searching is done.

      • offerDetails

        @RolesAllowed(value="ADMIN")
@GET
@Path(value="/offersDetails/ofrId/{ofrId}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject offerDetails(@PathParam(value="ofrId")
                                                                     int ofrId)
        This method will get offer details from database based on offer id.
        Parameters:
        ofrId - A unique id of an offer.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject which contains whole details of offers entity.
